description: System-generated unique identifier for this actual resource entry on a work order.
Reference to the specific work order asset/procedure line this resource effort is recorded against.
Date and time the labor/resource work was performed.
Identifier of the resource (e.g., technician or equipment) that performed the work.
Trade or skill classification of the resource used for costing and reporting (e.g., mechanic, electrician).
Sequence number of this resource line within the associated work order/procedure.
Actual labor hours worked for this entry, used for costing.
Shift under which the work was performed (e.g., day, swing, night); confirm code set with SME.
Pay category applied to the hours (e.g., regular, overtime) that drives rate multipliers and costing.
Base hourly labor rate in effect when the work was performed, before multipliers or premiums.
General ledger account charged for the labor cost of this entry.
Indicates whether cost is split across multiple GL accounts; likely a flag or allocation reference; confirm with SME.
System timestamp of the most recent change to this record.
Free-text notes about the work performed or context for this resource entry.
Additional options or flags affecting processing or billing of this entry; likely system-specific; confirm with SME.
Multiplier applied to the base hourly rate (e.g., 1.5 for overtime) to calculate extended cost.
Category of the associated code (e.g., labor activity, pay, or reason code); confirm domain with SME.
Charge or activity code applied to this resource entry for costing or reporting; exact meaning depends on code_type; confirm with SME.
Application-side timestamp when a user last updated this record.
Additional hourly premium or surcharge applied on top of the base rate; confirm calculation rules with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this resource entry.
Timestamp when this resource entry was created by a user.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified by a user.
